service Create a lasting power of attorney

This tool will guide you through the process of creating a lasting power of attorney (LPA). When you've finished you'll be able to print out the completed LPA and get it signed and registered.

What you need to know

Get started

Close

Before you start...

Before you can use this service we need an email address and password from you. You'll be able to use these details to save your progress part-way through and return later if you need to.

(If you've already done this, please Sign in here)
